archimate:Folder.name: 3.3.5 Hosting Feeds for Community Brokers
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Services providing streaming alerts from the online and offline distribution sources to the community-provided brokers which the project has a Memorandum of Understanding with (a non-legally binding agreement).
Full brokers, unlike minibrokers, manage coordination of picture mapping and not just alert characterization and comparison of detection vs physics.
